panels.description: The percentage of validators expected to attest that did so during the prior epoch. Full support: Lighthouse, Prysm, Teku. No support: Lodestar, Nimbus

targets.expr:
max by (group,service,network) (beacon_prev_epoch_target_gwei{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}/beacon_prev_epoch_active_gwei{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) or
max by (group,service,network) (beacon_previous_live_validators{group="$group"}/beacon_previous_active_validators{group="$group"}) or
max by (group,service,network) (beacon_participation_prev_epoch_target_attesting_gwei_total{group="$group"}/beacon_participation_prev_epoch_active_gwei_total{group="$group"})

panels.description: Network liveness is a measure of how quickly blocks are being finalized on the network. 100% means that the blocks are being finalized as quickly as the protocol allows. Full support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku

targets.expr:
clamp_min((1-(4*(
((max by (service) (slotclock_present_epoch{group="$group"}) or
max by (service) (beacon_current_epoch{group="$group"}) or
max by (service) (beacon_epoch{group="$group"}) or
max by (service) (floor(beacon_clock_slot{group="$group"}/32)) or
max by (service) (floor(beacon_clock_time_slot{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"} / 32)))
- max by (service) (beacon_finalized_epoch{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) - 2)
/100))),0)

topk by (service) (1,beacon_node_syncing_active{group="$group"} + 10) or

on(service) bottomk by (service) (1,sync_eth2_synced{group="$group"}) or

panels.description: The mathematical expectation of time between proposals for an individual validator and across all local validators. These numbers are based on the number of validators and the number of slots/day, and do not represent a prediction or countdown between proposals. Full support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku

targets.expr:
max by (network) (
    (
        max by (network) (beacon_current_active_validators{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) /
        max by (network) (total_local_validators:active{group="$group"})  /
        7200
    )
    or
    (
        max by (network) (beacon_current_active_validators{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) / 
        count by (network) (count by (network, pubkey) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH{group="$group"})) /
        7200
    )
)

targets.expr:
max by (network) (besu_blockchain_chain_head_transaction_count{group="$group"}) or
max by (network) (eth_con_beacon_transactions{group="$group",block_id="head"}) or
max by (network) (txs_per_slot_count{group="$group"})

panels.description: Current number of active, pending, exiting, and slashed validators. Pending and exiting validators will include length of time to process the current queues, where available. Full support: Prysm. Partial support: Lighthouse, Nimbus, Teku, Lodestar

targets.expr:
max by (group,service,state) (validator_count{group="$group",state="Active",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) or
max by (group,service,state) (validator_count{group="$group",state="Pending",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) or
max by (group,service,state) (validator_count{group="$group",state="Exiting",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) or
max by (group,service,state) (validator_count{group="$group",state="Slashed",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) or
max by (group,service,state) (label_replace(beacon_current_active_validators{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}, "state", "Active", "", ""))

max by (group,service,state) (label_replace(((max by (group,service,state) (validator_count{group="$group",state="Pending",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"})) /
    ignoring(state) (max by (group,service,state) ((floor(validator_count{group="$group",state="Active",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}/65536) > 4) or vector(4)))*6.4), "state", "Pending", "", "")) or
max by (group,service,state) (label_replace(((max by (group,service,state) (validator_count{group="$group",state="Exiting",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"})) /
    ignoring(state) (max by (group,service,state) ((floor(validator_count{group="$group",state="Active",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}/65536) > 4) or vector(4)))*6.4), "state", "Exiting", "", ""))

panels.title: Validator Count

panels.description: Hourly, daily, weekly, and monthly balance changes to both validators and addresses. Displays the annualized rate of change based on the balance change for the period. Withdrawals will show as a reduction in balance and may result in a lower/negative annualized rate of change until 1 period has past without a withdrawal. Full support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku

targets.expr:
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:384s{group="$group"})               or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:1h{group="$group"})                 or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:1d{group="$group"})                 or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:7d{group="$group"})                 or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:30d{group="$group"})                or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:365d{group="$group"})               or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"}) or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"})   or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"})   or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"})   or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"})  or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"})

(
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:384s{group="$group"})               or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:1h{group="$group"})                 or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:1d{group="$group"})                 or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:7d{group="$group"})                 or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:30d{group="$group"})                or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:365d{group="$group"})               or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"}) or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"})   or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"})   or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"})   or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"})  or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"})
) * on() scalar(avg(ethprice{cur="$currency"}))

(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:384s{group="$group"}) * 365 * 225 or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:1h{group="$group"})   * 365 * 24  or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:1d{group="$group"})   * 365       or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:7d{group="$group"})   * 365 / 7   or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}  or on() vector(0))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:30d{group="$group"})  * 365 / 30  or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"} or on() vector(0))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:365d{group="$group"})

label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)), "period", "384s", "", "") or
label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)), "period", "1h", "", "") or
label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)), "period", "1d", "", "") or
label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)), "period", "7d", "", "") or
label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}), "period", "30d", "", "") or
label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"}), "period", "365d", "", "")

(
    label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)), "period", "384s", "", "") or
    label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)), "period", "1h", "", "") or
    label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)), "period", "1d", "", "") or
    label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)), "period", "7d", "", "") or
    label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}),  "period", "30d", "", "") or
    label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"}), "period", "365d", "", "")
) * on() scalar(avg(ethprice{cur="$currency"}))

((scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:384s{group="$group"}) * 365 * 225 or
((scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:1h{group="$group"})   * 365 * 24  or
((scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:1d{group="$group"})   * 365       or
((scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:7d{group="$group"})   * 365 / 7   or
((scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}  or on() vector(0)))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:30d{group="$group"})  * 365 / 30  or
((scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:365d{group="$group"})

sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"}) + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"})   + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"})   + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"})   + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"})  + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}  or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"}) + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"} or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:384s{group="$group"})               + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:1h{group="$group"})                 + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:1d{group="$group"})                 + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:7d{group="$group"})                 + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:30d{group="$group"})                + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}  or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:365d{group="$group"})               + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)))

(
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"}) + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"})   + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"})   + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"})   + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"})  + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}  or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"}) + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"} or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:384s{group="$group"})               + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:1h{group="$group"})                 + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:1d{group="$group"})                 + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:7d{group="$group"})                 + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:30d{group="$group"})                + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}  or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:365d{group="$group"})               + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)))
) * on() scalar(avg(ethprice{cur="$currency"}))

(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)) + (scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)))))
    / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:384s{group="$group"}) * 365 * 225 or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)) + (scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)))))
    / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:1h{group="$group"})   * 365 * 24  or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)) + (scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)))))
    / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:1d{group="$group"})   * 365       or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)) + (scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)))))
    / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:7d{group="$group"})   * 365 / 7   or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}  or on() vector(0)) + (scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}  or on() vector(0)))))
    / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:30d{group="$group"})  * 365 / 30  or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)) + (scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)))))
    / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:365d{group="$group"})

sum by (group,service,agent) (libp2p_peers_identity{group="$group"}) or
sum by (group,service,agent) (label_replace(libp2p_peers_per_client{group="$group"}, "agent", "$1", "Client", "(.*)")) or
sum by (group,service,agent) (label_replace(libp2p_connected_peers_current{group="$group"}, "agent", "$1",  "client", "(.*)")) or
sum by (group,service,agent) (label_replace(lodestar_peers_by_client_count{group="$group"}, "agent", "$1",  "client", "(.*)")) or
sum by (group,service,agent) (connected_libp2p_peers{group="$group"})

panels.title: Consensus Peer Type

panels.description: Count of consensus and execution client peers over time. Full support: Besu, Erigon, Geth, Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nethermind, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku
panels.title: Peers

panels.description: Number of consensus peers of each type over time, stacked. Full support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku

targets.expr:
sum by (group,service,agent) (libp2p_peers_identity{group="$group"}) or
sum by (group,service,agent) (label_replace(libp2p_peers_per_client{group="$group"}, "agent", "$1", "Client", "(.*)")) or
sum by (group,service,agent) (label_replace(libp2p_connected_peers_current{group="$group"}, "agent", "$1",  "client", "(.*)")) or
sum by (group,service,agent) (label_replace(lodestar_peers_by_client_count{group="$group"}, "agent", "$1",  "client", "(.*)")) or
sum by (group,service,agent) (connected_libp2p_peers{group="$group"})

panels.title: Consensus Peers by Type

panels.description: Execution layer pending and queued transactions over time, stacked. Full support: Erigon, Geth, Nethermind. Partial support: Besu

targets.expr:
max by (service) (txpool_pending{group="$group"}) or
on(service) (execution_txpool:pending{group="$group"}) or
on(service) (besu_transaction_pool_transactions{group="$group"}) or
on(service) (eth_exe_txpool_transactions{group="$group",status="pending"})

max by (service) (txpool_queued{group="$group"}) or
on(service) (execution_txpool:queued{group="$group"}) or
on(service) (eth_exe_txpool_transactions{group="$group",status="queued"})

panels.title: Execution Layer Transaction Pools

panels.description: Number of API calls received per second. Full support: Besu, Erigon, Geth, Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nethermind, Prysm, Teku

targets.expr:
sum by (group,service) (rate(rpc_total{group="$group"}[1m]) or
sum by (group,service) (rate(rpc_requests{group="$group"}[1m])) or
sum by (group,service) (rate(validator_beacon_node_requests_total{group="$group"}[1m])))

panels.title: RPC  Received per Second

panels.description: The percentage of validators expected to attest that did so during the prior epoch. Full support: Lighthouse, Prysm, Teku. No support: Lodestar, Nimbus

targets.expr:
max by (group,service,network) (beacon_prev_epoch_target_gwei{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}/beacon_prev_epoch_active_gwei{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) or
max by (group,service,network) (beacon_previous_live_validators{group="$group"}/beacon_previous_active_validators{group="$group"}) or
max by (group,service,network) (beacon_participation_prev_epoch_target_attesting_gwei_total{group="$group"}/beacon_participation_prev_epoch_active_gwei_total{group="$group"})

panels.title: Participation Rate

panels.description: Network liveness is a measure of how quickly blocks are being finalized on the network. 100% means that the blocks are being finalized as quickly as the protocol allows. Full support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku

targets.expr:
clamp_min((1-(4*(
((max by (service) (slotclock_present_epoch{group="$group"}) or
max by (service) (beacon_current_epoch{group="$group"}) or
max by (service) (beacon_epoch{group="$group"}) or
max by (service) (floor(beacon_clock_slot{group="$group"}/32)) or
max by (service) (floor(beacon_clock_time_slot{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"} / 32)))
- max by (service) (beacon_finalized_epoch{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) - 2)
/100))),0)

panels.title: Network Liveness

panels.description: Number of active validators in the network. Full support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku
panels.title: Network Active Validators

panels.description: Current and head slot of the consensus layer. Click to see slot information at an explorer. Full support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku

targets.expr:
max by (group,service,explorer) (floor((time() - last_over_time(consensus_beacon_genesis_time{group="$group"}[2h]))/12)) or
max by (group,service,explorer) (beacon_slot{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) or 
max by (group,service,explorer) (beacon_clock_slot{group="$group"})

panels.title: Slots

panels.description: Current, justified, and finalized epochs of the consensus layer. Click to see epoch information at an explorer. Full support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku

targets.expr:
max by (group,service,explorer) (floor(beacon_clock_time_slot{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"} / 32)) or
max by (group,service,explorer) (beacon_epoch{group="$group"}) or max by (group,service,explorer) (floor((time() - last_over_time(consensus_beacon_genesis_time{group="$group"}[2h]))/384))

panels.title: Epochs

panels.description: Head and finalized block of the execution layer. Click to see block information at an explorer. Full support: Besu, Erigon, Geth, Nethermind

targets.expr:
max by (group,service,explorer) (chain_head_block{group="$group"}) or
max by (group,service,explorer) (ethereum_best_known_block_number{group="$group"}) or
max by (group,service,explorer) (nethermind_blocks{group="$group"}) or
max by (group,service,explorer) (sync{group="$group",stage="finish"})

panels.title: Blocks

panels.description: Current number of active, pending, exiting, and slashed validators. Pending and exiting validators include length of time to process the current queues, where available. Full support: Prysm. Partial support: Lighthouse, Nimbus, Teku, Lodestar

targets.expr:
max by (group,service,state) (validator_count{group="$group",state="Active",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) or
max by (group,service,state) (validator_count{group="$group",state="Pending",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) or
max by (group,service,state) (validator_count{group="$group",state="Exiting",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) or
max by (group,service,state) (validator_count{group="$group",state="Slashed",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) or
max by (group,service,state) (label_replace(beacon_current_active_validators{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}, "state", "Active", "", ""))

max by (group,service,state) (label_replace(((max by (group,service,state) (validator_count{group="$group",state="Pending",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"})) /
    ignoring(state) (max by (group,service,state) ((floor(validator_count{group="$group",state="Active",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}/65536) > 4) or vector(4)))*6.4), "state", "Pending", "", "")) or
max by (group,service,state) (label_replace(((max by (group,service,state) (validator_count{group="$group",state="Exiting",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"})) /
    ignoring(state) (max by (group,service,state) ((floor(validator_count{group="$group",state="Active",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}/65536) > 4) or vector(4)))*6.4), "state", "Exiting", "", ""))

panels.title: Validator Count

panels.description: The percentage of validators expected to attest that did so during the prior epoch. Red line displays participation rate under which the network will be unable to finalize. Full support: Lighthouse, Prysm, Teku. No support: Lodestar, Nimbus

targets.expr:
max by (group,service,network) (beacon_prev_epoch_target_gwei{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}/beacon_prev_epoch_active_gwei{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) or
max by (group,service,network) (beacon_previous_live_validators{group="$group"}/beacon_previous_active_validators{group="$group"}) or
max by (group,service,network) (beacon_participation_prev_epoch_target_attesting_gwei_total{group="$group"}/beacon_participation_prev_epoch_active_gwei_total{group="$group"})

panels.title: Participation Rate

panels.description: Client network traffic as reported by clients. Full support: Erigon, Geth, Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nethermind, Nimbus
panels.title: Client Network Traffic

panels.description: The number of active validators (left-axis), the number of pending, exiting, and slashing validators (right axis), and the number of pending deposits (right axis) over time. Pending validators and deposits are shown as positive values, while exiting and slashing validators are shown as negative values. Full support: Prysm. Partial support: Lighthouse,  Lodestar, Nimbus, Teku

targets.expr:
max by (group,service) (validator_count{group="$group",state="Exiting",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) or
on (group,service) (beacon_processor_exit_queue_total{group="$group"}) or
on (group,service) (label_replace(lodestar_oppool_voluntary_exit_pool_size{group="$group"}, "state", "Exiting", "", ""))

panels.title: Network Validators

panels.description: The percentage of the gas limit used over time. Full support: Besu, Erigon, Ethereum Metrics Exporter, Geth, Nethermind
panels.title: Base Fee/Gas Used

panels.description: Number of transactions, voluntary exits, attester slashings, and proposer slashing in the head block over time. Full support: Ethereum Metrics Exporter. Limited support: Besu, Prysm

targets.expr:
max by (network) (besu_blockchain_chain_head_transaction_count{group="$group"}) or
max by (network) (eth_con_beacon_transactions{group="$group",block_id="head"}) or
max by (network) (txs_per_slot_count{group="$group"})

panels.title: Head Block Transactions

panels.description: Number of transactions, voluntary exits, attester slashings, and proposer slashing in the head block over time. Full support: Ethereum Metrics Exporter. Limited support: Besu, Prysm
panels.title: Head Block Validator Actions

panels.description: Block size over time. Full support: Ethereum Metrics Exporter
panels.title: Block Size

panels.description: Latest base fee per gas. Full support: Besu, Erigon, Geth, Nethermind
panels.title: Base Fee per Gas

panels.description: The percentage of the gas limit used. Full support: Besu, Erigon, Ethereum Metrics Exporter, Geth, Nethermind.
panels.title: Gas Used

panels.description: Number of epochs that have passed since the last finalized epoch. Optimal value is 2. Full support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku

targets.expr:
(max by (service) (slotclock_present_epoch{group="$group"}) or
max by (service) (beacon_current_epoch{group="$group"}) or
max by (service) (beacon_epoch{group="$group"}) or
max by (service) (floor(beacon_clock_slot{group="$group"}/32)) or
max by (service) (floor(beacon_clock_time_slot{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"} / 32)))
- max by (service) (beacon_finalized_epoch{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"})

panels.title: Epochs Since Finalization

panels.description: The mathematical expectation of time between proposals for an individual validator and across all local validators. These numbers are based on the number of validators and the number of slots/day, and do not represent a prediction or countdown between proposals. Full support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku

targets.expr:
max by (network) (
    (
        max by (network) (beacon_current_active_validators{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) /
        max by (network) (total_local_validators:active{group="$group"})  /
        7200
    )
    or
    (
        max by (network) (beacon_current_active_validators{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) / 
        count by (network) (count by (network, pubkey) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH{group="$group"})) /
        7200
    )
)

panels.title: Expected Time Between Proposals

panels.description: Number of transactions, voluntary exits, attester slashings, and proposer slashing in the head block. Full support: Ethereum Metrics Exporter. Limited support: Besu.
panels.title: Head Block

panels.description: The percentage of the gas limit used. Full support: Besu, Erigon, Ethereum Metrics Exporter, Geth, Nethermind.
panels.title: Gas Used

panels.description: Displays the number of times the chain has been reorganized since the consensus client restarted. Full support: Ethereum Metrics Exporter. Partial support: Lighthouse, Prysm, Nimbus, Teku
panels.title: Beacon Reorgs

panels.description: Software client details, including version, latest release, uptime, and database size. Full support: Erigon,  Lighthouse, Prysm. Partial support: Besu, Ethereum Metrics Exporter, Geth, Lodestar, Nethermind, Nimbus, Teku

targets.expr:
(
topk by (service) (1,version{group="$group"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,lighthouse_info{group="$group"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,prysm_version{group="$group"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,beacon_teku_version{group="$group"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,execution_version{group="$group"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,prometheus_build_info{group="$group"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,lodestar_version{group="$group"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,blackbox_exporter_build_info{group="$group"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,node_exporter_build_info{group="$group"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,dirk_release{group="$group"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,vouch_release{group="$group"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,process_start_time_seconds{group="$group"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,eth_exe_web3_client_version{group="$group"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,eth_con_node_version{group="$group"})
) * on(client) group_left(tag_name,html_url) topk by (client) (1,last_over_time(release_id{client!=""}[2h]))

sum by (service) (bcnode_disk_beaconchain_bytes_total{group="$group"}) or
sum by (service) (eth_db_chaindata_disk_size{group="$group"} + eth_db_chaindata_ancient_size{group="$group"}) or
sum by (service) (db_size{group="$group"}) or
sum by (service) (store_disk_db_size{group="$group"})

panels.title: Group Software: $group

panels.description: Software client details, including current version, latest release, and uptime. Full support: blackbox_exporter, Grafana, node_exporter, Prometheus. Partial support: json_exporter

targets.expr:
(
topk by (service) (1,prometheus_build_info{host="$host",group=""}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,blackbox_exporter_build_info{host="$host",group=""}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,node_exporter_build_info{host="$host",group=""}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,grafana_build_info{host="$host",group=""}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,process_start_time_seconds{host="$host",group=""})
) * on(client) group_left(tag_name,html_url) topk by (client) (1,last_over_time(release_id{client!=""}[2h]))

panels.title: Host Software: $host

panels.description: Sum of the current balance of all local validators. Full support: Nimbus, Lighthouse, Lodestar, Prysm, Teku
panels.title: Validators Balance (ETH)

panels.description: Excess balance above the 32 ETH/validator minimum stake required per validator. This value is calculated as the sum of all validator balances minus the number of validators multiplied by 32. Full support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku

targets.expr:
(sum by (group,network) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH{group="$group"})) -
    scalar(32 * count(count by (pubkey) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH{group="$group"}))) or
sum by (group,network) (validator_balance{group="$group",job="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) -
    (max by (group,network) (total_local_validators:active{group="$group"}) * 32)

panels.title: Validator Withdrawable (ETH)

panels.description: Sum of the current balance of all monitored addresses. Full support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku
panels.title: Addresses Balance (ETH)

panels.description: The value of monitored Ethereum addresses plus the difference between validator balances and required minimum stake. Support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku.

targets.expr:
((sum by (group,network) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH{group="$group"})) -
    scalar(32 * count(count by (pubkey) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH{group="$group"}))) or
sum by (group,network) (validator_balance{group="$group",job="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) -
    (max by (group,network) (total_local_validators:active{group="$group"}) * 32)) + sum by (group,network) (address_balance:ETH{group="$group"})

panels.title: Withdrawable + Addresses (ETH)

panels.description: Difference between validator balances and initial stake plus the value of monitored Ethereum addresses. (Prysm) Note: This value is calculated based on the current balance of validators and addresses, and does not take into account any withdrawals that may have been performed.

targets.expr:
((sum by (group,network) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH{group="$group"}))  or
sum by (group,network) (validator_balance{group="$group",job="$prysm_validator_job_name"})) + sum by (group,network) (address_balance:ETH{group="$group"})

panels.title: All Balances (ETH)

panels.description: Current price of ETH in $currency.
panels.title: ETH Price ($currency)

panels.description: Current price of ETH in $currency.
panels.title: ETH Price ($currency)

panels.description: Sum of the current balance of all local validators multiplied by the price of ETH in the configured currency. Full support: Nimbus, Lighthouse, Lodestar, Prysm, Teku

targets.expr:
sum by (group,network) (validator_balance{group="$group"} * scalar(avg(ethprice{cur="$currency"}))) or
sum by (group,network) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH{group="$group"})

panels.title: Validators Balance ($currency)

panels.description: $currency value of excess balance above the 32 ETH/validator minimum stake required per validator. Full support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku

targets.expr:
(
    (sum by (group,network) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH{group="$group"})) -
        scalar(32 * count(count by (pubkey) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH{group="$group"}))) or
    (sum by (group,network) (validator_balance{group="$group"}) -
        (max by (group,network) (total_local_validators:active{group="$group"}) * 32))
) *
scalar(avg(ethprice{cur="$currency"}))

panels.title: Validator Withdrawable ($currency)

panels.description: Fiat value of the sum of the current balance of all monitored Ethereum addresses. Full support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku
panels.title: Addresses Balance ($currency)

panels.description: The $currency value of monitored Ethereum addresses and the difference between validator balances and required minimum stake. Support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku.

targets.expr:
((
    (sum by (group,network) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH{group="$group"})) -
        scalar(32 * count(count by (pubkey) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH{group="$group"}))) or
    (sum by (group,network) (validator_balance{group="$group"}) -
        (max by (group,network) (total_local_validators:active{group="$group"}) * 32))
) *
scalar(avg(ethprice{cur="$currency"}))) + (sum by (group,network) (address_balance:ETH{group="$group"}) or on() vector(0)) * scalar(avg(ethprice{cur="$currency"}))

panels.title: Withdrawable + Addresses ($currency)

panels.description: Total earnings and address balances in fiat. (Prysm) This value is calculated based on the current balance of validators and addresses, and does not take into account any withdrawals that may have been performed.

targets.expr:
((
    (sum by (group,network) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH{group="$group"})) or
    (sum by (group,network) (validator_balance{group="$group"})) 
) *
scalar(avg(ethprice{cur="$currency"}))) + (sum by (group,network) (address_balance:ETH{group="$group"}) or on() vector(0)) * scalar(avg(ethprice{cur="$currency"}))

panels.title: All Balances ($currency)

panels.description: Number of proposals. Each client's proposal count will reset to zero when the client restarts. Full support: Prysm, Teku, Nimbus, Lodestar. No support: Lighthouse
panels.title: Proposals

panels.description: Hourly, daily, weekly, and monthly balance changes to both validators and addresses. Displays the annualized rate of change based on the balance change for the period. Withdrawals will show as a reduction in balance and may result in a lower/negative annualized rate of change until 1 period has past without a withdrawal. Full support: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku

targets.expr:
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:384s{group="$group"})               or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:1h{group="$group"})                 or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:1d{group="$group"})                 or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:7d{group="$group"})                 or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:30d{group="$group"})                or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:365d{group="$group"})               or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"}) or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"})   or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"})   or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"})   or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"})  or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"})

(
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:384s{group="$group"})               or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:1h{group="$group"})                 or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:1d{group="$group"})                 or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:7d{group="$group"})                 or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:30d{group="$group"})                or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:365d{group="$group"})               or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"}) or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"})   or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"})   or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"})   or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"})  or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"})
) * on() scalar(avg(ethprice{cur="$currency"}))

(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:384s{group="$group"}) * 365 * 225 or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:1h{group="$group"})   * 365 * 24  or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:1d{group="$group"})   * 365       or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:7d{group="$group"})   * 365 / 7   or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}  or on() vector(0))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:30d{group="$group"})  * 365 / 30  or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"} or on() vector(0))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:365d{group="$group"})

label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)), "period", "384s", "", "") or
label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)), "period", "1h", "", "") or
label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)), "period", "1d", "", "") or
label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)), "period", "7d", "", "") or
label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}), "period", "30d", "", "") or
label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"}), "period", "365d", "", "")

(
    label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)), "period", "384s", "", "") or
    label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)), "period", "1h", "", "") or
    label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)), "period", "1d", "", "") or
    label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)), "period", "7d", "", "") or
    label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}),  "period", "30d", "", "") or
    label_replace(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"}), "period", "365d", "", "")
) * on() scalar(avg(ethprice{cur="$currency"}))

((scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:384s{group="$group"}) * 365 * 225 or
((scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:1h{group="$group"})   * 365 * 24  or
((scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:1d{group="$group"})   * 365       or
((scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:7d{group="$group"})   * 365 / 7   or
((scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}  or on() vector(0)))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:30d{group="$group"})  * 365 / 30  or
((scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)))) / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:365d{group="$group"})

sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"}) + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"})   + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"})   + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"})   + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"})  + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}  or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"}) + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"} or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:384s{group="$group"})               + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:1h{group="$group"})                 + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:1d{group="$group"})                 + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:7d{group="$group"})                 + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:30d{group="$group"})                + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}  or on() vector(0))) or
sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:365d{group="$group"})               + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)))

(
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"}) + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"})   + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"})   + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"})   + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"})  + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}  or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"}) + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"} or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:384s{group="$group"})               + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:1h{group="$group"})                 + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:1d{group="$group"})                 + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:7d{group="$group"})                 + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:30d{group="$group"})                + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}  or on() vector(0))) or
    sum by (period) (validator_balance:increase:365d{group="$group"})               + scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)))
) * on() scalar(avg(ethprice{cur="$currency"}))

(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)) + (scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:384s{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)))))
    / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:384s{group="$group"}) * 365 * 225 or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)) + (scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1h{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)))))
    / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:1h{group="$group"})   * 365 * 24  or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)) + (scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:1d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)))))
    / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:1d{group="$group"})   * 365       or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)) + (scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:7d{group="$group"}   or on() vector(0)))))
    / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:7d{group="$group"})   * 365 / 7   or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}  or on() vector(0)) + (scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:30d{group="$group"}  or on() vector(0)))))
    / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:30d{group="$group"})  * 365 / 30  or
(scalar(sum(consensus_validator_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)) + (scalar(sum(address_balance:ETH:increase:365d{group="$group"} or on() vector(0)))))
    / total_staked_ETH:avg_over_time:365d{group="$group"})

panels.description: Details of locally monitored validators, including status, balance, attestations, aggregations, proposals, and inactivity score. Validator address links to explorer information for each validator. Includes display of most recent proposal slot with link to view slot details at explorer. Full support: Prysm. Limited support: Lighthouse, Nimbus, Teku.

targets.expr:
sum by (service) (rate(process_io_storage_read_bytes_total{group="$group"}[1m])) or
sum by (service) (rate(system_disk_readbytes{group="$group"}[1m])) or
sum by (service) (rate(store_disk_db_read_bytes_total{group="$group"}[1m]))

sum by (service) (rate(process_io_storage_written_bytes_total{group="$group"}[1m])) or
sum by (service) (rate(system_disk_writebytes{group="$group"}[1m])) or
sum by (service) (rate(store_disk_db_write_bytes_total{group="$group"}[1m]))

sum by (service) (rate(bolt_tx_writes_total{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}[1m])) or
sum by (service) (rate(lodestar_db_write_req_total{group="$group"}[1m]))

sum by (service) (rate(lodestar_db_read_req_total{group="$group"}[1m]))

panels.description: Displays the current slot and the slot number for the next scheduled proposal across all local validators. Also displays the amount of time remaining until that slot. Time remaining is as of the last Grafana data refresh. Full support: Prysm

targets.expr:
max by (group,service,explorer) (floor((time() - last_over_time(consensus_beacon_genesis_time{group="$group"}[2h]))/12)) or
max by (group,service,explorer) (beacon_slot{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) or 
max by (group,service,explorer) (beacon_clock_slot{group="$group"})

min by (group,network,explorer) (max by (group,network,pubkey) (validator_next_proposal_slot{group="$group"} > scalar(floor((time() - last_over_time(consensus_beacon_genesis_time{group="$group"}[2h]))/12)))) or on() vector(-1)

min by (group,network,explorer) (max by (group,network,pubkey) (validator_next_proposal_slot{group="$group"} > scalar(floor((time() - last_over_time(consensus_beacon_genesis_time{group="$group"}[2h]))/12)))) * 12 + scalar(max by (group,network) (last_over_time(consensus_beacon_genesis_time{group="Goerli Prysm/Geth"}[2h])) - time())

targets.expr:
max by (group,service,explorer) (floor((time() - last_over_time(consensus_beacon_genesis_time{group="$group"}[2h]))/12)) or
max by (group,service,explorer) (beacon_slot{group="$group",job!="$prysm_validator_job_name"}) or 
max by (group,service,explorer) (beacon_clock_slot{group="$group"})

min by (group,network,explorer) (max by (group,network,pubkey,explorer) (validator_next_attestation_slot{group="$group"} > scalar(floor((time() - last_over_time(consensus_beacon_genesis_time{group="$group"}[2h]))/12)))) * 12 + scalar(max by (group,network,explorer) (last_over_time(consensus_beacon_genesis_time{group="$group"}[2h])) -  time())
